title: From Willing Sub to Enslaved Captive
description: After discovering her submissive nature, Suzie Foster finds a Dom who she believes can give her everything she needs.But after a time, his attitude and treatment begin to change.Even with her limited experience in the Lifestyle, Suzie knows she has to end their Dom/sub relationship.Then, just when things seem to be going right for Suzie, she is taken from her life and held captive.Will Suzie ever get to experience the true Dom/sub relationship she seeks?Or is the life of an enslaved captive; at the hands of a cruel Dom, the last thing she will ever know?**BE Some descriptions are vivid and can be a trigger for sensitive readers.**Graphic**Sexual Content**Language**Suitable for ages 18 and over
author: Scarlett Flame
